name: ColorClimb
description:
Submission for the ScoreSpace-Jam: "Climbing"

-------------------------------------

How to Play:

Click to jump/move an arm of the monkey. 

Be careful! The arms are "distance controlled". Always the nearest arm will jump to the clicked point!

HAVE FUN!

--------------------------------------

MAKING OF:

Graphics made with Affinity Designer.

Music made with Medly.

Programmed in Unity(C#).

SoundEffects were recorded normally(QuickTimePlayer)
